page.title: 19 A Village in W.Stafford.
page.content: The only village in our area is Derrington (population 1500), it is about two miles West of Stafford.We interviewed our Deputy Head,Mrs Keeling who lives there.She said they have these facilities:- a church,shop,bus service,pub,playing space for children, youth club and playgroup,but they do not have a Doctor,Dentist,bank,public park or school. The village has changed, because many years ago there were only about four cottages and a farm.The church is about 160 years. Some of the old houses have had new houses built around them,then the old house taken down.Now most of the houses are new and have been built in the last twenty years.Most people work outside of the village.
